title: Bug 27869 - StyledText overuse of Font.getFontData
description:
Bug 27869 - StyledText overuse of Font.getFontData
Btw, UTF8 is the default English encoding for Redhat 8. FontMetrics API is also very used by the StyledText, I believe that the metric information should be cached in the StyledText and updated only when the font is changed.
EB: I believe, and many people agree, that this API should not be used by the StyledText when it's being typed.
